org.raxa.module.handlesms

Enum Keyword

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Keyword>
      • org.raxa.module.handlesms.Keyword
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Keyword>

    public enum Keyword
extends java.lang.Enum<Keyword>
    Contains Keyword which user will send like

    GET MENU

    GET REM

    GET UNREG

    Enum shouldnot be change while runtime.Will break Menu.class

    Author:
    atul
